name: Nadejen Majority Faith
desc: $market is home to a majority of Nadejen believers. Stability is improved if it is controlled by the Nadejen Synod, and otherwise greatly reduced.

name: Nadejen Patriotism
desc: Though sceptical of Nadejen religious tenets, $market's population still feels loyalty to the idea of Nadejen independence. Stability is improved if it is controlled by the Tanjan Fellowship or the Synod, and otherwise reduced.
